text:
@AlexanderDowner 1.7 million people have now contracted coronavirus, the vast majority of those cases since mid-March and 102,000 people have died from the coronavirus pandemic.

No wonder @LiberalAus threw you out of their leadership, still being an idiot !

😂 😂 😂 😂 😂 😂 😂 😂 

#auspol
